name: Alaca
description:
Alaca is an action rogue like game with a Top down perspective. In this game, which offers a different map with each playthrough, we must find and destroy the source of the power before the spreading dark power leaves us completely defenseless. While it contains different types of weapons and elements, you must build and master your character by combining them in the most correct way. There is no save point. kill, build character, learn and repeat..

Alaca developed the game with a team of two people. In order to maximize our game, we want to grow our team with your support and complete our game by raising the bar even higher. At the same time, we want to make the construction process more interactive with your suggestions. We intend to add your suggestions to the game by voting on them by coming to our discord address below.

You can express your thoughts about the game by joining our Discord address, and you can also participate in the voting by writing what you want to see in the game and contribute to the production of the game with this voting.

Our hero has lost his memory and starts over from the same day every time he dies. Our hero, who has lost his memory and sees that every day he starts is different, finds himself slowly being taken over by this mysterious power while investigating the reason for this. He goes on an expedition to find his lost memory and investigate the source of this mysterious power.

The map changes randomly every time the game starts. However, you should change your tactics and pay attention to high-level creatures. By strengthening our character with different types of weapons and elements, you can establish different compositions and develop in different stats. Creatures are available with different elements and at different levels. Depending on the elements the creatures are connected to, you may be burned, frozen, warped or poisoned. Although the game contains variety such as mini bosses and elite enemies, you will want to hunt these creatures for stronger equipment and abilities. But you have to be careful because as time goes by, this mysterious power will weaken you more and strengthen your enemies. Embark on an adventure and solve this mystery in this race against time.
